title: Ender pearl
author: 路邊電燈泡
txt_content: RT,Ender pearl到底有甚麼用?就只有打Enderman有用嗎?

replies.author: nic148
replies.txt_content:
詳細也不清楚,wiki更新了後說Ender Pearl是沒用的
''The Ender Pearl is a new item in the 1.8 update and is sometimes dropped by Endermen upon death. Currently this item has no use and all future uses of the Ender Pearl are currently unknown. These pearls can be commonly found in bodies of water "naturally" as Endermen will occasionally walk into water and die there from water damage''

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:

詳細也不清楚,wiki更新了後說Ender Pearl是沒用的
''The Ender Pearl is a new item in the 1.8 update an ...
原來Ender Pearl是騙人的!幾乎沒用!

replies.txt_content: 我也被它騙了,早知就不翻譯ender pearl,WTF!

replies.txt_content: 就和1.7版本以前的史莱姆球一样。。
